description: Help Swampy the Alligator get his bath! Disney’s hit physics-based puzzler arrives on Windows 8 with high-definition graphics and fluid gameplay optimized for the Modern UI. Swampy lives in the sewers under the city, but unlike the other gators, he just wants to be clean. Unfortunately, the other alligators have sabotaged his water supply! It’s up to you to navigate subterranean layers of earth and guide fresh water directly to Swampy’s bathtub.
